resources.string:
Activi

Activi is a native mobile application that allows users to create and join nearby events on the fly.

Activi provides an innovative solution to the isolating culture of modernity by leveraging mobile technology to draw users closer together in the real world. In effect, the app provides a service that strengthens interpersonal engagement and community connections by providing users the opportunity to engage in spur of the moment activities in their area.

 

Butterknife – (http://jakewharton.github.io/butterknife/)

Annotate fields with @BindView and a view ID for Butter Knife to find and automatically cast the corresponding view in your layout.

License: Apache License, Version 2.0
URL: http://jakewharton.github.io/butterknife/#license

 

Firebase – (https://firebase.google.com/)

Firebase gives you the tools to develop high-quality apps, grow your user base, and earn more money. We cover the essentials so you can monetize your business and focus on your users.

License: Commercial
URL: https://www.firebase.com/terms/terms-of-service.html

 

Material Rating Bar – (https://github.com/DreaminginCodeZH/MaterialRatingBar)

Material Design RatingBar with better appearance, compatible with Android 3.0+.

License: Apache License, Version 2.0
URL: https://github.com/DreaminginCodeZH/MaterialRatingBar#license

 

Parceler – (https://github.com/johncarl81/parceler)

Parceler is a code generation library that generates the Android Parcelable boilerplate source code.

License: Apache License, Version 2.0
URL: https://github.com/johncarl81/parceler#license

 

ZXing – (https://github.com/zxing/zxing)

ZXing ("zebra crossing") is an open-source, multi-format 1D/2D barcode image processing library implemented in Java, with ports to other languages.

License: Apache Licence, Version 2.0
URL: https://github.com/zxing/zxing/blob/master/LICENSE

 

Picasso – (http://square.github.io/picasso/)

Images add much-needed context and visual flair to Android applications. Picasso allows for hassle-free image loading in your application—often in one line of code!

License: Apache License, Version 2.0
URL: http://square.github.io/picasso/#license
